title: *** Sold *** : T206 Cy Young portrait - PSA 3 (Sweet Caporal)
author: svtPONY95

posts.post_title: *** Sold *** : T206 Cy Young portrait - PSA 3 (Sweet Caporal)
posts.post_content:
A beautiful card for the grade with no creases or surface wrinkles and a dark green flawless background. It has white borders with no staining and a nice clean Sweet Caporal back.

$975   **** Sold ****
